content: HUNNYPLAY   The best crypto gaming platform HUNNYPLAY is launching their signature campaign on bitcointalk. You are encouraged to make a discussion on their official ANN ⭐HunnyPlay.com | Best Crypto Casino 🎲 180% Welcome Bonus 🎁 28% Cashback.As a campaign manager to guarantee your payment I am holding $1900 USDT (TRC20)The address will be topped up regularly as we progress each week.Escrow addressTPV9ajtLLDehB9YMZW9xQSAGHXxhjqF5brFrom week 2 (09/12) payment will be in BTC. Each week, I will prepare the spreadsheet and ask the owner to send btc to my wallet. Once btc sent, I will pay the rewards to eligible participants.The USDT on the escrow address will stay untouched just in case we need it to use in any emergency.Campaign rewardsLegendary members: $2.40 per post up to 25 posts each weekHero members: $2.00 per post up to 25 posts each weekSr. Members: $1.60 per post up to 25 posts each weekFull members: $1.20 per post up to 25 posts each weekMembers: $0.80 per post up to 25 posts each weekThe management will appreciate if you volunteer some sort of customer support on behalf of them when absence on HunnyPlay ANN threadCampaign Rules▶️ Wear appropriate Signature, avatar▶️ Minimum 5 posts in a signature week to get paid▶️ Minimum 5 posts in Gambling, Gambling discussion section▶️ Maximum 10 posts will be paid in Gambling, Gambling discussion section▶️ Maximum 3 posts on local boards will be counted for payments.▶️ Post must be minimum 150 characters long and constructive.▶️ Post in the following boards/sections are not eligible to receive payment: Off-Topic, Archival, Games & Rounds, Investor-based games, other signature campaign threads including this one, any kind of ANN threads (ANN posted in Gambling board are allowed), Wall observers, Serious discussion, Altcoin Discussion, Press, Politics & Society and where signature is not visible will not count. ▶️ Post in HunnyPlay ANN thread will be paid.▶️ No valid negative from DT network unless per-approves by me. ▶️ You must have minimum 5 merits in the last 120 days.▶️ Join my telegram group: https://t.me/R7BountyQAImportant informationYou are not allowed to change anything on the signature code, if found then you will be disqualified without prior notice. ◀️I reserve the full right to add/remove any participants, push/cancel/reopen the campaign or any rules of this campaign. ◀️Week starts from Friday and ends on Thursday UTC ◀️Please check the spreadsheet comment column regularly, and also always check your payment information. ◀️   SPREADSHEET   How to
